title: Stockton fuels UGA's latest rally to topple Ole Miss
content: Gunner Stockton went 12-for-12 with three touchdowns in the second half, helping Georgia outscore Ole Miss 17-0 in the fourth quarter of Saturday's 43-35 win.

content: The plane carrying the Packers' players and coaches was delayed by more than five hours before leaving for Phoenix in advance of Sunday's game vs. the Cardinals.

content: Penn State fell to 3-4 -- and 0-4 in the Big Ten -- after blowing a late lead against Iowa in interim coach Terry Smith's first game since replacing James Franklin.

content: Blue Jays manager John Schneider says he's optimistic George Springer will be available against the Seattle Mariners in Game 6 of the AL Championship Series in Toronto on Sunday night.

content: UAB, with new interim coach Alex Mortensen and new starting QB Ryder Burton in charge, stunned No. 22 Memphis 31-24, clinching the win with a goal-line stand.

title: Bihar polls: Parties' caste arithmetic vs caste survey ‚Äî who is living upto Karpoori's dream?
content: Despite a caste survey highlighting the dominance of backward classes, Bihar's upcoming elections see parties prioritizing traditional vote banks over population-based representation. Parties are fielding candidates based on established loyalties, with the BJP and JD(U) within the NDA showing a significant number of upper-caste candidates, while RJD focuses on Yadavs and Muslims.

title: '25,000 Americans would've died': Video shows moment US struck 'drug-carrying' submarine - Watch
content: US forces destroyed a large drug-carrying submarine en route to the United States, preventing an estimated 25,000 potential overdose deaths. Two suspected traffickers were returned to Ecuador and Colombia for prosecution, while two others were killed in the strike. This action is part of a broader campaign against drug trafficking from Latin America.

title: Upset Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang says: Our market share has fallen to Zero from 95% in ...
content: Nvidia's advanced AI chip dominance in China has evaporated, dropping to zero due to US export controls. CEO Jensen Huang revealed the company is completely barred from selling high-performance chips, warning this exclusion harms both nations and cedes the market to domestic rivals like Huawei.  China's push for self-sufficiency accelerates this shift.

title: Bengaluru horror: Man kills wife, stages electrocution to hide crime
content: A whirlwind Instagram romance turned deadly when a 25-year-old electrician allegedly murdered his 32-year-old wife, a single mother. He attempted to stage her death as an accidental electrocution, but a postmortem revealed strangulation. The husband confessed to the crime, citing infidelity suspicions, after a nine-month marriage.

title: Happy Choti Diwali 2025: 50+ heartwarming wishes,thoughtful quotes and greetings
content: Choti Diwali, celebrated a day before Diwali, holds deep cultural and spiritual significance in India. This occasion emphasizes home cleansing, spreading joy, and exchanging heartfelt wishes and messages with loved ones. The article provides a collection of heartwarming wishes, thoughtful quotes, and personalized messages for family, friends, and colleagues to make greetings memorable.

title: Rohit Sharma joins staggering list featuring MS Dhoni, Virat Kohli in Perth
content: Rohit Sharma achieved a significant milestone, playing his 500th international match for India, becoming the fifth Indian to do so. He also stands on the cusp of breaking Shahid Afridi's record for the most sixes in ODI cricket. Sharma's impressive career includes captaining India to T20 World Cup and Champions Trophy victories.

title: ScaleAl lays off an entire team; then invites employees to..
content: Scale AI has disbanded its Dallas-based New Projects Organization, a team of contractors focused on general AI chatbot improvement. This move, following a significant Meta investment, signals an industry pivot towards specialized, expert-level AI training in fields like medicine and robotics.  Affected workers received severance and were offered opportunities on Scale's gig platform.

title: Bihar polls: Seat pact still elusive, INDIA bloc at odds on CM face as well?
content: INDIA bloc partners face a test of coherence as RJD pushes for Tejashwi Yadav as CM face, while Congress and CPI-ML remain non-committal. "Friendly fights" in several constituencies highlight the alliance's internal friction, raising concerns about presenting a united front ahead of nominations closing.

title: US govt shutdown: How Trump admin's closure is impacting workers, economy
content: The US federal government shutdown is nearing a historic length with no resolution in sight. Millions of federal workers face unpaid days and potential job cuts, while the economy suffers significant losses, particularly in tourism and air travel. Both parties remain entrenched, with Democrats prioritizing healthcare and Republicans pushing for broader budget cuts.

title: IND vs AUS: Inside Rohit Sharma‚Äôs fitness revolution - '11,000 grams lighter'
content: Former India coach Abhishek Nayar revealed Rohit Sharma's 11-kilo weight loss was a strategic move for the 2027 World Cup, aiming for enhanced fitness, agility, and to amplify his already exceptional skills. This transformation is also a mental boost for the skipper, who is keen to prove his worth with runs on the board.

title: Zepto cuts 300 jobs: CEO eyes top spot; cost drive intensifies
content: Quick commerce startup Zepto has laid off approximately 300 employees, transferring them to third-party providers as part of a significant cost-efficiency drive. This move follows a substantial $450 million funding round that valued the company at $7 billion.  Zepto is also cutting other operational expenses to bolster its competitive position in India's rapidly growing quick commerce market.

title: What is Mavericks star Anthony Davis‚Äô net worth?
content: NBA star Anthony Davis, now with the Dallas Mavericks, is set to wear protective glasses following a retina injury.  His career boasts significant earnings, with a net worth of $180 million, fueled by lucrative contracts and endorsements from major brands like Nike.  Davis is also venturing into film and production, showcasing his diverse off-court success.

title: IND vs AUS: Shubhman Gill joins legendary list after Dhoni & Kohli
content: Shubman Gill takes over as India's 28th ODI captain, marking the first time in a decade Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli play under a new leader.  This signifies a generational shift in Indian cricket, with Gill stepping into leadership against Australia in Perth.  The match promises to be a significant moment for the young captain.

title: Travis Kelce defends Taylor Swift amid backlash over ‚Äòshowgirl‚Äô marketing
content: Taylor Swift's 38 album variants for 'The Life of a Showgirl' spark debate, with some calling her marketing 'exploitative' despite her business genius.  Limited editions create urgency, driving resale markets.  While Swift earns through music, critics question if she sells authenticity or aspiration from her 'gilded fortress,' prompting fans to consider their purchasing habits.

title: Ayesha Curry quietly shows love for Stephen Curry amid recent backlash
content: Despite recent fan backlash over her personal comments, Ayesha Curry showed unwavering support for husband Stephen Curry after a Warriors loss. She shared a team cheer and presented him with custom cakes, highlighting their enduring bond. The couple remains focused on their family amidst public scrutiny, with Ayesha's past podcast remarks continuing to fuel debate.

title: Carter Hart delivers strong message to Mitch Marner and the Golden Knights
content: Carter Hart is making an NHL comeback with the Vegas Golden Knights on a professional tryout contract. After a hiatus, the 27-year-old goaltender is eager to prove himself, having learned and grown from past experiences.  Vegas aims to bolster their goaltending with Hart, who will be eligible to play from December 1st, potentially debuting soon after.

title: It‚Äôs on for old and new! Gill era starts off in Rohit, Virat‚Äôs presence - preview
content: An astonishing 1,75,000 tickets sold for the India-Australia ODI series in Perth, defying concerns about the format's relevance.  While Shubman Gill leads a new era, the spotlight remains on Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma's return against a formidable Australian pace attack.  Their performance will be crucial in this highly anticipated series opener.

title: It‚Äôs Bhoot Chaturdashi today: India‚Äôs own Halloween, where spirits come alive
content: As India gears up for Diwali, Narak Chaturdashi, also known as Choti Diwali, ushers in the festivities with a focus on cleansing and renewal. Celebrated on October 20, 2025, this day marks Lord Krishna's victory over Narakasura, symbolizing good triumphing over evil. In Bengal, it's Bhoot Chaturdashi, honoring ancestors with fourteen lamps and leafy greens.

title: Sri Lanka bus attack, Karachi tragedy, and? When cricketers faced life-threatening attacks
content: Cricket's global appeal has been overshadowed by tragic violence on a number of instances. The 2009 Sri Lankan team bus attack in Lahore, a 2002 bomb blast forcing New Zealand's tour abandonment in Pakistan, and the recent deaths of Afghan cricketers in a cross-border airstrike highlight the grave risks teams face when touring volatile regions.

title: Watch: Australia fans mock Virat Kohli; star batter's fierce stare silences them
content: Virat Kohli returns to the Indian jersey for the first ODI against Australia in Perth, marking his first appearance since the Champions Trophy.  Despite facing fan taunts with a stern gaze, his coach asserts he has nothing left to prove, highlighting his immense contribution and preparedness for the series.

title: Meet the man behind China‚Äôs viral lottery and live-stream scandal
content: A man from Dezhou, Shandong province won 10.17 million yuan in December 2024. He reportedly spent a large portion on gambling and live-streamers. His wife, Yuan, discovered the funds depleted and filed for divorce. The incident has caused widespread outrage and legal attention. It highlights the consequences of sudden wealth and irresponsible financial behavior.

title: Controversy erupts as NFL refuses to punish Patrick Mahomes for taunting Lions player
content: Patrick Mahomes will not be fined for his touchdown celebration against the Lions, despite the NFL's increased scrutiny on taunting. League officials reviewed the footage and determined his actions did not warrant a penalty. This decision comes as Brian Branch, who Mahomes interacted with, faces suspension for a separate incident.

title: Paktika tragedy! Rashid Khan's bold move after Pak aerial strikes kill Afghan cricketers
content: Afghanistan captain Rashid Khan removed Lahore Qalandars from his social media bio following Pakistani aerial strikes that killed civilians, including three cricketers. Khan expressed deep sadness and supported the Afghanistan Cricket Board's decision to withdraw from upcoming fixtures against Pakistan, stating national dignity comes first.

title: Love America, hate Trump: ‚ÄòNo Kings‚Äô rallies sweep US streets; White House hits back
content: Millions of Americans protested across the country in a "No Kings" movement against President Trump‚Äôs perceived authoritarianism. Demonstrators criticised his immigration policies, militarisation of cities, and federal overreach. Trump and allies dismissed them as ‚Äúhate America rallies‚Äù by radicals. Despite deep divisions, protests remained largely peaceful, with witty slogans and satire urging focus on domestic issues and democratic values.

title: Fans call to shut down TwitchCon after shocking attack on streamer Emiru
content: TwitchCon San Diego faced intense backlash after streamer Emiru was assaulted during a meet-and-greet. The incident, where a fan kissed her without consent, sparked outrage and calls for Twitch to improve security and accountability. Twitch responded by banning the assailant and increasing security, but many remain skeptical.

title: Mitch Marner net worth 2025: How the Golden Knights star built his Vegas fortune
content: Mitch Marner, a dynamic right-winger, has joined the Vegas Golden Knights on a significant eight-year, $96 million contract, boosting his estimated net worth to $20-25 million.  His move from the Toronto Maple Leafs, following a career-best 102-point season, also brings lucrative endorsements from major brands. Fans anticipate his impact on the upcoming NHL season.

title: Kevin Durant and Liz Cambage dating? NBA-WNBA stars spark romance rumors
content: Houston Rockets star Kevin Durant sparked dating rumors with ex-WNBA player Liz Cambage after a photo from Drake's concert surfaced. Cambage, however, has vehemently denied the speculation, stating she was merely "recreating a meme" and is "married to the game."  Durant also expressed his desire to retire with the Rockets.

title: Josh Allen and Hailee Steinfeld: Inside their lavish life and million-dollar fortune
content: NFL star Josh Allen and BAFTA-nominated actress Hailee Steinfeld, who began dating in 2023, have a combined net worth nearing $100 million. Their luxurious lifestyle includes significant real estate investments, with Allen owning a $7.2 million Dana Point property and Steinfeld a $8 million Encino home. Allen recently praised Steinfeld as an "unbelievable, undeniable rockstar."

title: Who is Anthony McClelland? Exploring LeBron James‚Äô alleged father and his legacy
content: LeBron James' biological father, Anthony McClelland, abandoned him and his mother, Gloria James, shortly after his birth. McClelland had no role in James' upbringing, leading to initial resentment. However, James later found inspiration in his father's absence, striving to be a better dad. Despite McClelland's later attempts at contact, James has maintained no relationship with him.

title: NFL trade deadline 2025: Eagles, Saints, Titans rumors & updates
content: NFL teams are buzzing with trade activity. The Saints aim to extend Chris Olave. The Titans are open to trading most players except Jeffery Simmons and Cam Ward. The Eagles seek defensive help but will not trade A.J. Brown. Several teams are fielding calls on defensive stars. Contenders are strengthening their rosters for the second half of the season.

title: Bigg Boss 19: Salman Khan reacts to facing judgements throughout his career
content: Salman Khan reprimanded Amaal Mallik on Bigg Boss 19 for his foul language and derogatory remarks during arguments. Khan emphasized the lasting impact of reactions, drawing parallels to his own past experiences. Amaal's father, Daboo Malik, also expressed disappointment, leading to an emotional exchange where Amaal apologized for being 'triggered'.

title: 'No agreement unless...': Centre's big update on India-US trade deal; talks 'not bound by deadline'
content: India and the US are progressing in trade agreement talks with a cordial atmosphere, according to Union Minister Piyush Goyal. New Delhi is committed to safeguarding the interests of its farmers, fishermen, and MSMEs, emphasizing that no agreement will be finalized without their protection. Discussions are constructive, aiming for a win-win solution to boost bilateral trade.

title: March to NSS headquarters seeks Sukumaran Nair‚Äôs exit
content: When authorities denied protesters‚Äô request to offer floral tributes at the Mannathu¬†Padmanabhan memorial located inside the NSS headquarters, they performed the ritual on the road in front of the community leader‚Äôs portrait

title: BJP A.P. chief urges people to buy indigenous products this festive season
content: P.V.N. Madhav highlights importance of supporting local firecrackers and diyas, stresses communal harmony

title: Allahabad High Court slams U.P. police for illegally detaining interfaith couple under ‚Äòsocial pressure‚Äô
content: The court said that the State government and its law enforcement machinery are expected to use their power to protect the liberty of a citizen and not to succumb to social pressures and curtail freedom

title: 'No Kings' Protests Against Trump See Huge Crowd, Washington Calls Them Anti-American
content: Protesters spanning all age groups took to the streets en masse for "No Kings" rallies across the United States on Saturday, denouncing what they view as authoritarian tendencies and unbridled corruption of US President Donald Trump.

title: "25,000 Americans Would've Died": Trump As US Strikes 'Drug-Carrying Submarine'
content: President Donald Trump said Saturday the United States was sending two suspected drug traffickers back to their native Ecuador and Colombia, after a military strike on their "drug-smuggling submarine" in the Caribbean that killed two others.

title: Ayodhya Eyes Guinness Record, To Light 26 Lakh Diyas On Deepotsav Today
content: Ayodhya is set to celebrate Deepotsav from today, marking the homecoming of Lord Shri Ram. The grand preparations are underway for Deepotsav to create history with over 26 lakhs diyas.

title: "India Working On 2 nm Chip": Ashwini Vaishnaw Shows 'Wafer' At NDTV Summit
content: Digital credit, fast mobile data and large language models (LLMs) - these are among some of the initiatives that India has taken in its digital-led growth story, Union Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw said at the NDTV World Summit in Delhi today.

title: Have 'Credible Reports' Of Hamas Planning Attack Against Gaza Civilians: US
content: The US State Department on Saturday said it had "credible reports" that Palestinian armed group Hamas was planning an imminent attack against civilians in Gaza, a move Washington said would be a "ceasefire violation."

title: Shashi Tharoor Praises PM Modi For Facilitating Abu Dhabi's BAPS Mandir
content: Shashi Tharoor commended PM Narendra Modi's pivotal role in facilitating the establishment of the BAPS Hindu Mandir in Abu Dhabi, noting that PM Modi's engagement with UAE helped transform the vision of a Hindu place of worship into reality

title: Pakistan, Afghanistan Agree To Ceasefire After Days Of Deadly Clashes
content: Afghan and Pakistani delegations were in the Qatari capital, Doha, on Saturday, for talks on defusing the deadliest crisis between them in several years, after more than a week of fighting killed dozens of people and injured hundreds on both sides.

title: JNU Students Clash With Cops During Protest March, 28 Detained
content: Dismissing claims by Left-affiliated student groups from the Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU) that they were assaulted on Saturday, the Delhi Police has said 28 students were detained while trying to gherao the Vasant Kunj police station.

title: NDA Candidate Seema Singh's Nomination Papers Rejected On 'Technical Grounds' In Bihar Polls
content: In an embarrassment to the ruling NDA in poll-bound Bihar, nomination papers of Seema Singh, one of the candidates of Union minister Chirag Paswan's party, got rejected on Saturday.

title: Chandrayaan-2 Makes First Ever Obseravtion Of Sun's Impact On Moon: ISRO
content: The Chandrayaan-2 mission, launched in 2019, has made the first-ever observation of the effects of the Sun's Coronal Mass Ejection (CME) on the Moon using its onboard scientific instruments, ISRO said on Saturday.

title: Nepal's Gen Z To Form Political Party, Sets 'Bottom Line' Before 2026 Polls
content: Nepal's Gen Z group on Saturday announced that it will establish a political party, but said its participation in next year's general election depends on the fulfilment of certain "bottom-line" conditions.

title: Actor Vijay's Party Credits Rs 20 Lakh To Families Of Karur Stampede Victims
content: Actor-politician Vijay's Tamilaga Vettri Kazhagam party on Saturday said Rs 20 lakh each has been credited to the families of those who lost their lives in the Karur stampede on September 27.

title: J&K Lieutenant Governor In Russia To Bring Back Lord Buddha's Relics
content: Jammu and Kashmir Lieutenant Governor Manoj Sinha has said that exposition of Holy Relics of Lord Buddha to Kalmykia will strengthen the people-to-people ties between India & Russia.

title: Pregnant Woman Killed By Father-In-Law In Alleged Dishonour Killing In Telangana
content: In a suspected case of honour killing, a pregnant woman was killed allegedly by her father-in-law in Kumuram Bheem Asifabad District of Telangana on Saturday as he opposed her marriage to his son, police said.

title: "Sensational Developments To Come": Nirav Modi To Court On Extradition Case
content: Fugitive diamantaire Nirav Modi, in prison for over six years, has told a UK court there are "sensational developments" to come when his Indian extradition case on fraud and money laundering charges reopens for a hearing in London next month.

title: Maharashtra Man Dies By Suicide At Home, Note Points To Reservation Issue
content: A 33-year-old man from Maharashtra's Beed district allegedly died by suicide, apparently frustrated over the "delay" in granting ST (Scheduled Tribe) status to the Dhangar community, an official said.

title: Delhi's Air Remains 'Poor' For 5th Straight Day Ahead Of Diwali
content: Delhi's air quality continued to deteriorate on Saturday, remaining in the "poor" category for the fifth consecutive day, with nine monitoring stations falling in the red zone of the "very poor" category as pollution levels spiked ahead of Diwali.

title: Buyers Prefer Gold Coin, Bar Over Jewellery On Dhanteras: Report
content: Soaring gold prices led Indian buyers to choose coins and bars over jewellery during the Dhanteras festival on Saturday, fuelled by hopes that the precious metal's glittering rally would continue.

title: 8 Killed, 15 Injured As Mini Truck Falls Into Gorge In Maharashtra
content: At least eight persons were killed and 15 others injured when a speeding mini truck fell into a gorge in Maharashtra's Nandurbar district on Saturday, police said.

title: Bihar Poll Candidate Leaves To File Nomination, Then Drops Out At Father's Order
content: Upset over not getting a BJP ticket for Bihar's Bhagalpur, Arjit Shashwat Choubey, son of former Union Minister Ashwini Choubey, was about to file nomination as an Independent candidate. But a phone call changed everything.

title: LaMelo playing 70+ games and other bold predictions for 2025-26
content: our fantasy basketball experts tasked them with detailing their boldest predictions for 2025-26 . he's currently 85th on average in ESPN live drafts, and his ability to create offense for others is only growing . Miller's coaching staff already trust him to find his own shot .

title: SC's SOP for poor undertrials: Government to pay surety; release within seven days
content: the new SOP was framed by a bench of justices M M Sundresh and S C Sharma after incorporating suggestions from amicus curiae . the case was taken up suo motu by SC after learning that thousands of undertrials are languishing in jail despite being granted bail just because of their inability to fill bail bonds with or without sureties .

title: Dragunov returns, Rhodes DQ, more
content: Ilja Dragunov defeated Sami Zayn to become the new champion . this week's "SmackDown" felt more like a valley compared to last week . impromptu Undisputed title match broke out after Jacob Fatu was attacked backstage .

title: J&K statehood row: Omar Abdullah mulls SC petition; says Centre out of touch on matter
content: CM Omar Abdullah says he is considering becoming a party to the case . he said he does not think anyone understands the disadvantages of being a Union Territory better than him . the apex court has ruled that consultations are underway with the j&K administration .

title: College football Week 8: Updates, top plays and  takeaways
content: Week 8  of the college football season had the  USC Trojans  and  Notre Dame Fighting Irish  in the latest ( and hopefully not last ) edition of their historic rivalry. The Irish, with two losses, need a win to stay alive in the College Football Playoff race and bolster their credentials. The Trojans are the only remaining team on the Irish's schedule that is currently ranked. The Irish got it behind a massive rushing day from  Jeremiyah Love . Also in prime time is this year's Holy War between the  Utah Utes  and  BYU Cougars . Since Kyle Whittingham's first full season at Utah in 2005, 13 of the 16 games against BYU have been decided by single digits. Follow along here for real-time highlights, and key moments from these games:

title: Vanderbilt poking fun at LSU headlines Week 8 college football trolls
content: the trolls came out in week 8 of the college football season . the Commodores defeated no. 10 LSU 31-24 on saturday . quarterback Diego Pavia accounted for 246 yards and three touchdowns .

title: The vibes are unusually high for the Giants: 'When you have that kind of spark... it raises everyone's level'
content: new: "the energy is there," tight end says of the team atmosphere . "Get Up" is the result of winning two of three games since rookie Jaxson Dart became the starting quarterback . it's the ultimatum for the Giants to win a game against the Eagles .

title: Projecting the CFP top 12 after Week 8: Big move for Bama
content: the 13 members of the college football playoff selection committee will meet for two days . they're going to meet at the Gaylord Texan Resort in Grapevine, Texas . the committee will do their own mock ranking to help the new members better understand the process .

title: Bontemps and Windhorst: The latest intel on the Lakers, Knicks, Rockets and more
content: the deadline for extensions for most eligible players is Monday at 6 p.m. ET . there's a lot of pessimism right now, even by normal standards . a star-studded free agent class in the summer of 2027 could all be available .

title: NHL Power Rankings: Canes on top, one futures bet for each team
content: a panel of ESPN hockey commentators, analysts, reporters and editors send in a 1-32 poll based on the games through Wednesday . previous ranking: 2 Points percentage: 100% Hurricanes win the Stanley Cup (+800). the first two games showcased Carolina's depth .

title: Postecoglou's coaching stint at Forest was short, but not Premier League's shortest
content: ange Postecoglou has been sacked by Nottingham Forest after just 39 days and five premier league matches in charge . he took over on september 9, making him the 10th permanent manager to last less than 100 days as a permanent manager during the era . sportsmail look at the managers who failed to make a positive impact in the early days of their reign .

title: New transport super-agency: How GTPRO will plan, monitor & speed up projects- All you need to know
content: the government‚Äôs in-principle go ahead to setting up apex federal agency for planning and monitoring of all modes of surface transport, railways, shipping, civil aviation and mass transit . the new entity ‚Äî GatiShakti Transport Planning and Research Organisation (GTPRO) ‚Äî to be housed in the Cabinet Secretariat will eliminate at least two layers of project approval process, which take around 60 days .

title: Ladakh protests: Authorities block Leh rally; silent march held in Kargil
content: the march was planned to mourn four people killed in alleged police firing during the protests demanding sixth Schedule status and statehood for ladakh . police and paramilitary forces were out in strength across leh early Saturday as the groups announced a two-hour silent march from 10am and a three-hour blackout from 6pm .
